Note: If you are on <=v1.1, uninstall the app and reinstall with the latest version to enable automatic updates

What's New

  • Fixed a bug where the alert window for SHA2 and MD5 hashes was not brought to the front/could be hidden behind other windows.
  • Added a real countdown timer for the alert window (countdown from 10s).

Note: If you are on <=v1.1, uninstall the app and reinstall with the latest version to enable automatic updates

What's New

  • seclook will prompt you with a small window in the top right of your screen before scanning any SHA2 or MD5 hash. This change is to prevent accidental scanning of confidential values.
  • Fixed an issue where macOS notifications would sometimes be buried in the Notification Center and not immediately display in the top-right of your screen when triggered.
